name: My Wife Wanted a Match 3 Game Without Ads
name_original: My Wife Wanted a Match 3 Game Without Ads
description:
My wife loves Match 3 games and hates ads.

I'm still working on this game, but I wanted to upload an in-progress version.
I know the resolution likely isn't working well. This is my first project on mobile and I'm still getting my handle on that.

My next sprint:

  • Better match logic than just horizontal/vertical (I want to get all matches in a block).
  • That will help me fix the Click game mode, which is currently not working.
